title: The reworked Malzahar
body: I think Malzahar should get nerfed. he can 1v1 a jungler and win at level 1 against a Volibear or Vi. It has happened to me for 5 games. Do something to nerf him.

replies.body: I dont 1v1 him, he 1v1 me, and i even get help when in jungle , and he still beats me and the other people in a 3v1
was it a 3v1 or 3 consecutive 1v1. this matters.

He has already been nerfed and is in a good spot right now. 
Solution. DONT 1v1 him!

Dude unless you're warwick don't 1v1 malz. .. that simple.

I think he has been needed enough,  I could see giving him a restricted item slot like Victor and rengar
Maybe something geared at the jungle

There is one thing you don't do against Malz, pre-rework and current, and that is **NEVER 1v1 him unless he is behind**.

Malz has always beaten down people who try and fight him solo while he is ahead, and what makes a good Malz is managing multiple targets.
